official_title: A bill to amend section 10530 of title 49, United States Code, to make the registration requirements of that section inapplicable to foreign carriers domiciled in Mexico.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to exempt foreign motor carriers of property domiciled in Mexico from the registration requirements imposed upon foreign motor carriers.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 10530 of title 49, United States Code, to make the registration requirements of that section inapplicable to foreign carriers domiciled in Mexico.
